task.summary: Default task
Working on driving fragments.
Set driving activity to keep screen from turning off.
Solved problem regarding Connection form. Create focus cycle to make data input easier.
Initial seattings commit
Created Settings activity with drawer. Solved issue with driving observer. Changed it to a Singleton Implementation
Created preferences view working with the drawer. Created stub controls for each functionality.
Implemented inverted mode.
Implemented change theme functionality
Fixed details from change theme functionality
Created Database to store Preferences. Preferences now are recovered from database after connection and ara stored in database after any parameter changes.
Implemented Bluetooth connection. (WIP) Still doesn't work :(
(WIP) Managed to connect to a device, but it still fails most of the times
Bluetooth connection working. Must keep on testing to refine functionality and solve bugs.
(WIP) Changed Connection UI to give up on login/pass form to a list of discovered devices.
Changed Connection UI to give up on login/pass form to a list of discovered devices.
Created launcher logo
Modified back button to create a logical navigation hierarchy.
Created an adapter that generates all frames to be sent to the device.
Changed DataSenderAdapter as requisition from the communication API. Changed int values from "RETORNA CONSULTA POSICIO" and "RETORNA CONSULTA ORIENTACIO" to short values to send 2 bytes instead of 4.
Changed Connection Activity interface to apply changes on scanning protocol. Now the device will scan during 5 seconds and the connection view will have a button to set a "rescan".
Modified DataSenderService to send a final frame to stop the lsmaker robot
Implemented accelerometer control. Modified AccelerometerDrivingFragment to use the accelerometer control.
Modified SliderDrivingFragment to use the TiltService.
Modified SliderDrivingFragment to add a TextView to show current speed indicated by vertical seekbar.
Commit to ensure every class is commented and to clean code.

MESSAGE.value: Working on driving fragments.
Set driving activity to keep screen from turning off.
Solved problem regarding Connection form. Create focus cycle to make data input easier.
Initial seattings commit
Created Settings activity with drawer. Solved issue with driving observer. Changed it to a Singleton Implementation
Created preferences view working with the drawer. Created stub controls for each functionality.
Implemented inverted mode.
Implemented change theme functionality
Fixed details from change theme functionality
Created Database to store Preferences. Preferences now are recovered from database after connection and ara stored in database after any parameter changes.
Implemented Bluetooth connection. (WIP) Still doesn't work :(
(WIP) Managed to connect to a device, but it still fails most of the times
Bluetooth connection working. Must keep on testing to refine functionality and solve bugs.
(WIP) Changed Connection UI to give up on login/pass form to a list of discovered devices.
Changed Connection UI to give up on login/pass form to a list of discovered devices.
Created launcher logo
Modified back button to create a logical navigation hierarchy.
Created an adapter that generates all frames to be sent to the device.
Changed DataSenderAdapter as requisition from the communication API. Changed int values from "RETORNA CONSULTA POSICIO" and "RETORNA CONSULTA ORIENTACIO" to short values to send 2 bytes instead of 4.
Changed Connection Activity interface to apply changes on scanning protocol. Now the device will scan during 5 seconds and the connection view will have a button to set a "rescan".
Modified DataSenderService to send a final frame to stop the lsmaker robot
Implemented accelerometer control. Modified AccelerometerDrivingFragment to use the accelerometer control.
Modified SliderDrivingFragment to use the TiltService.
Modified SliderDrivingFragment to add a TextView to show current speed indicated by vertical seekbar.
Commit to ensure every class is commented and to clean code.
